titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude from gross income any amount awarded under a Federal Pell Grant and any portion of a scholarship used by a full-time student for room and board.
Scholarship Tax Relief for Students Act of 2021
Scholarship Tax Relief for Students Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Scholarship Tax Relief for Students Act of 2021
This bill excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, any amount awarded under a Federal Pell Grant and any portion of a scholarship used by a full-time student for room and board.
